items.summary: Fully replace (overwrite) `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` with the exact user-provided V25 “AETHER GENESIS” code block as the new app UI (Landing → Client → Creator), preserving the intended layout, styling, and interaction behavior.
Apply only the minimal mechanical fixes required for this repository to compile and run with the pasted V25 code, without altering the intended V25 UI/UX behavior.
Ensure the V25 Helix navigation (service-first top bar) correctly filters the salon feed instantly by category selection, including the “Tout” category showing all salons.

Implement the missing “Living Matter” card behaviors described by the user while preserving the V25 aesthetic: (1) an integrated swipe gallery experience, (2) a fused fashion-magazine-style bio + contact presentation, and (3) availability rendered as pulsing ‘heartbeat’ dots on the salon surfaces.

Upgrade the Creator Cockpit to match the specified V25 requirements: provide Live Preview (split view on large screens, modal preview on mobile) and an “AI Assist” button that generates an ‘Aura’ marketing description locally (no external AI services).

Make the Creator “deploy” state update robust against stale closures: when adding a newly deployed salon, update `salons` using a functional state update so the new salon always appears immediately at the top of the Client list.
